segments.text: Fair-Priced Fares , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is a round-trip ticket to London ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you plan to go , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the second week of September .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The second week of September is still in the high-season , so the cheapest tickets are $ 650 . The high season lasts until the 15th , so fares after that date are cheaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , I'll go after the 15th . How much are the off-season fares ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our cheapest ticket is $ 550 on American Airlines .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I'll take it . ( to be continued )
segments.speaker: S2
